ygData.subject: Screaming Mace Question
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I am considering buying a Screaming Mace.  Right now I have a BloodForge Hammer, whic does great dmg, but is slow and heavy.  I also find I am soloing
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

I am considering buying a Screaming Mace. Right now I have a BloodForge
Hammer, whic does great dmg, but is slow and heavy. I also find I am
soloing less, so I want a 1H that I can use my SBS with.

My current 1H blunt is a FS Mace, which has 8dmg, and rougly the same dly as
the Screaming Mace. Its wt is 10.

Other than the magical effects, is there any advantage to buying one? Or
should I save my money?

Brytewing, lvl 16 halfling cleric.
